item.title: Aligning Medical Images with General Knowledge from Large Language Models
item.author: Yi
item.description: Our final year project was recognized as the champion among all best final year projects in the CSE department at HKUST for the 2023-2024 academic year.

item.title: D2UE: Revisiting Deep Ensemble Uncertainty
item.author: Yi
item.description: This repository hosts the official PyTorch implementation of our MICCAI 2024 early accepted paper, “Revisiting Deep Ensemble Uncertainty for Enhanced Medical Anomaly Detection”.
